summary.title: SUMMARY
summary.content: DevOps & Infrastructure engineer with 15+ years designing and operating secure, large-scale distributed systems on AWS and Kubernetes. Expert in Terraform-driven IaC, automated CI/CD pipelines, and cloud-native security controls. Proven track record leading small, high-impact teams to deliver fault-tolerant platforms for 1M+ users.

jobs.title: Staff Platform Engineer
jobs.bullets:
- Designed and maintained multi-region Kubernetes clusters handling 14k RPS for 1,400+ domains, using **Terraform** and Git-Ops.
- Built fault-tolerant, blue/green **CI/CD pipelines** in GitHub Actions and ArgoCD with automated container security scans.
- Hardened platform via IAM, VPC network segmentation, and secret rotation policy compliant with CIS benchmarks.
- Mentored a seven-person DevOps squad shipping production infrastructure code multiple times per day.

jobs.title: Lead Software Engineer
jobs.bullets:
- Migrated monolithic services to **Docker & Kubernetes**, cutting deployment time from 30 min to 5 min.
- Introduced **Terraform** modules and **Ansible** playbooks that eliminated manual drift across 5 game back-ends.

jobs.title: DevOps Lead
jobs.bullets:
- Re-architected Linux/AWS environments with **Puppet** and Terraform, improving release frequency by 3Ã—.
- Launched secure sandbox pipelines enabling developers to spin up full e-commerce stacks locally in <2 mins.

jobs.title: Automation Engineer
jobs.bullets:
- Containerised Unity build farm; reduced build time from 20 min to 4 min via distributed caching and Bazel-style remote exec.
- Created one-click CI dashboards for artists and designers, increasing adoption to 95% of studio.
